location: 華亭街 (Huating Street), Datong District - 281m from Yanping Station, 503m from Taipei Main Station, near Ningxia Night Market and Dihua Street
notes: Newly completed unit (新成屋) with quality finishes, renovated within past 6 months. 3BR/2BA layout with modern amenities including water filtration, bidet toilet, and separate wet/dry bathroom. Professional building management in 21-story elevator building. Good natural light expected from 7th floor position. No specific baby safety concerns noted but balcony access should be verified. No pets allowed. Management fee of NT$3,143/month is additional cost.
